column3: â€œHerijuana blows me away. If you smoke this, be prepared to not be active.  The batch I purchased doesn't knock me out right away, but it lays the groundwork very well if needed,and insomnia was one of the reasons I wanted to try it.  Surprisingly, it works more as a fairly quick sleep aid if you smoke smaller quantities.  Last night I smoked a large bowl myself and it was a very trippy high.  I was left immobile, and...â€

â€œBy far the best strain I have found for my issues. I have chronic back pain, depression and anxiety, and I suffer from stage c2 colon cancer, PTSD and am a recovering heroin addict. This strain is excellent for my appetite, my back pain and my stress, I highly recommend to anybody looking for a medication for appetite stimulation and insomnia in particular.â€

â€œThis Strain is the  motherfuckong shit man i smoked 4 bowls from a steamroller omg, leme tell u im stoned as fuck right now so yeah..
i felt a strong buuzz,i feel blown to the dome omg it also gave me the ablility to rap.. i also felt really mello, a full body tingleâ€

â€œBest couch lock/sleep strain I've ever had. I have severe insomnia and also take sleeping pills but when I found this strain I flushed them pills down the toilet! I've tried every indica possible and this by far has helped me the most with my insomnia. It's a very potent strain and sometimes I get panic attacks when I smoke. but the CBGA % on most phenos of Herijuana are very high which helps curb the euphoric/physco...â€
â€œIn-da-couch pain relief rescue comes on fast then creeeps...midnight tokin' Bliss...calming, soothing, sooo Kind!...I'm doing the Dali-melt...ğŸ’¤ğŸ’¤â€

â€œI would rate this a 4.5 overall. It has great flavor, earthy and pungent! I vape the dry bud and if you do just enough you can be very focused and task oriented and if you do just enough more you'll be totally relaxed and chill. Again the flavor, taste is amazing. Man I could just sniff the bag and be happy, lol!â€

â€œLook, its a bird, its a plane...its a real life superhero flying in to save the day!!  I don't care, I'm busy puffin on the best strain I've come across in a LONG time - maybe, dare I say it, ever!  I'm a bit biased as I am a kush guy at heart, but that fact in and of itself should tell you that I am a picky consumer of the indica.  

Herojuana came to me in large chunky nugs, from the most legit co-op in SoCal.  B...â€
â€œthird degree burns on fingers from grabbing a hot plate from the oven... Herojuana killed the pain. A+++â€

â€œBy far the best strain for insomnia and appetite stimulation by far. This is my favorite medicine, I make a propane concentrate as well, and it has been most effective in both forms, and both eaten and smoked. Highly recommend to patients seeking sleep aid, and the anti nausea properties are just amazing.â€

â€œI've had Herijuana before, but I bought a new strain of it called Orange Herijuana (Orange Creamsicle x Herijuana). The effects were more uplifted/euphoric than straight Herijuana. I was able to socialize (with friends who smoke) and watch TV/play video games. I also felt creative, and music was just amazing. It was almost like living in a dream world. Very pleasant. It's not as good for sleep/pain as straight Heriju...â€
â€œJason King wrote about Herijuana back in 2001 in the Cannabible and said most people simply shouldn't smoke it"
column4: which I took as a challange. 14 years on the east coast and never came across it
column5: this being my holy grail strain. I moved to Colorado this year and immediately pursued this
column6: my most sought after of nugs. My room mate works for a dispensery and they had Orange Herijuana
column7: of which I was very unimpressed. B...â€"

column3: â€œğŸ™ğŸ’€ Herijuana (Herojuana) from House of Herbs is a solid indica with very strong pain relieving effects. Dense and dark nugs, just slightly frosted over with a nice earthy armoa. I'm not too fond of the name, but this strain packs a mighty punch! I would highly recommend this for those who need help shutting their mind and bodies down after a busy day. All around solid indica.â€

â€œWow! This is one of the highest thc % content I've ever seen in person at 29.1% 1.8% cbd. A lot of ppl on here lie or wherever they get their flowers from are telling lies bc I frequently read reviews from ppl claiming thc % 30+, on strains that can't even get that high of a %. This is very rare to see a flower with this high thc content. Super heavy hitter , I think I just ate 4 or 5(?) bowls of cereal then passed o...â€
â€œPicked up the Orange Herijuana @ Native Roots. Had nice citrus flavor, mellow buzz, and worked pretty well for relaxing a pinched nerve.â€
â€œagain another strong one.  just trash your Hydrocodone, Prozac and your Benzodiazepines.. all those in one sexy green nuggâ€
â€œthis is the best strain I have ever used for insomnia.  extreme couch lock.  has the flavor of sandalwood spice and pepper.  Effects: 100% body, heavy, narcotic, will turn you to JELLY!â€
â€œthis is the best strain I have ever used for insomnia.  extreme couch lock.  has the flavor of sandalwood spice and pepper.  Effects: 100% body, heavy, narcotic, will turn you to JELLY!â€

â€œHerojuana is a strain that is difficult to accurately rate because so many dispensaries have it labeled wrong.  I sampled a batch from a very reputable place and found it to be a very strong indica with a down and out" head and body stone.  It made me slightly self conscious.  I did not find the strain to be Euphoric.  It had an active head high and
column5: this is either a good thing or a bad thing...â€"

column3:
â€œI mainly use cannabis to treat my seizures that are caused by lack of good sleep. Herojuana is simply fantastic. It gives you a nice warm hug before you fall into a nice cozy long sleep. I naturally wake up every morning at 6am and herojuana doesn't make me feel sleepy when I wake up even though this strain has a THC content near 30%. (Ps: I naturally have a low tolerance)

Amazing comfy effect! My favorite H.Indica.â€

â€œI paid a premium price for this strain, $25/g and I bought 2 grams. I have to say I am impressed, just 2 puffs from the pipe and I am extremely relaxed and my eyelids are very heavy. For these effects I would normally have to smoke about 4 bowls of Kush. About 15 seconds after the first hit you are already under the influence of some powerful bud. 

The look is medium green with light green flecks and dark brown ha...â€

â€œI love herijuana, it's a strain that provides ultimate pain relief no matter how much I smoke it.
It's probably one of the best concentrates to have in your medicine box for pain, insomnia, and nausea.
It gets rid of the constant motion sickness I feel, and that's major. Sometimes I am stuck in bed all day because my equilibriums off I feel so nauseous. 
Herijuana is a god send for health problems like psuedoaneurysm...â€

â€œThe oz we bought was nice and sticky with the little orange hairs and all that jazz. Smelled as good as bowl of fruit and tasted citrus-y when smoked. I feel so relaxed and creative. I am so excited to be sitting in bed eating a bunch of oranges on tumblr while high #420â€
â€œIt's a take in bed flower,  can't stay awake on it.â€

â€œ5/5 and my favorite strain yet. I have bought this many times over the past year whenever I can. One of a few that has ever helped me SLEEP. Helps with pain and will definitely calm you down if you feel hyper. Does NOT cause anywhere near the level of head high or paranoia. A few downsides: you only get the full effects if you smoke (not vape) it, you have to smoke a lot of it if you really want it to knock you out, ...â€

â€œWTF just hit me?  Arms are numb from elbows to finger tips. Wife and I vaped, maybe three hits each at 356 degrees. Less than two minutes in and 80% of full impact felt. Both had eye watering laughing spree for about five minutes. Donâ€™t remember what started it but just kept riffing off each other till neither of us could catch our breaths from laughing so hard.  I highly recommend Herijuana and I am not a paid spoke...â€

â€œGot the Orange Herijuana from Native Roots on a recent camping trip in Aspen- I'm in love. Easily one of the best strains I've ever tried, and I've been smoking a long time now. Great citrusy, woodsy sort of aroma and flavor, with an intense body-high, but without the fogginess in the head. I felt clear headed and had plenty of energy, but without feeling anxious. This strain worked wonders for my back pain as well, ...â€

â€œIts not like getting hit by Mayweather, its more like getting hit by Tyson. woof.

With the right music, this indica can melt your chest and awaken your nervous system. A perfect date companion because focus will b...â€

â€œCovered in tendrils, Herojuana has an earthy flavor with an unusual aftertaste. The nugs are dense, you can flip the bowl no problem. After the first hit, the high takes a little longer than usual to set in. It starts with tingles, and  ends whenever your eyes shut.â€

â€œSomething about this HEAVY ass strain doesn't sit well with me. To each his own, maybe it's cause I had no clue how heavy and pure it was so I jumped in too heavy. I broke it up, smelled and looked amazing, I rolled it up and lit it. Taste was very sweet, amazing. Took a few hits and after 10mins I was seeing blinking lights and bright tracers. I smoked the second day and the same effect happened, except this time it...â€

â€œOut of the many strains I have smoked, Herijuana is hands down the finest. This strain's high CBD level is perfect for putting one in a state of relaxation. Lets just say; if a donkey were to kick me in my face, it wouldn't be an issue on Herijuana. This stuff takes the edge off; which is beneficial to me due to my ailments. Some of which are: OCD, IBS, anxiety,and depression.  Thank you Herijuana.â€

â€œFirm sticky medium green buds with tons of crystal trichomes & burnt orange hairs. Tasted & smelled of sweet lemon, pine, & mild skunk. Got great physical sedation from this Indica. Strain cultivated by CCC & contained 21% THC. Herijuana AKA Herojuana.â€
